explanation: [0-0] A group of people is standing in an open space. In front of them stands a little girl in a black vest with a blue and white sign on her chest. She extends her right hand forward. Behind her stand many people watching. Behind the little girl stands a man in a brown vest holding a microphone. Some people in the crowd are holding up their mobile phones. The ground is paved with gray, yellow, and beige bricks, and the sky is grayish-blue.
[0-3] Then the little girl squats rhythmically and swings her right arm. Her right fingers count as she squats, and then her right arm drops to her side.
